MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:46pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2:47pm on the 20th October 2020.
